author: gcolvin
content: So, easiest thing to do about April 1 PRs?  Unless we want to encourage them, nothing.  This year's batch has been closed, but are still in the repo.   If there is problem next year we deal with it then.  If we want to discourage them, just say so.

author: abcoathup
content: https://github.com/ethereum/EIPs/issues/4980 <- more spam;  I reported to GitHub.  Are you able to delete spam issues yet?
